Docs.summary: Represents a collection of all Import elements in a project.

Docs.param: A string representing the name of the <Import> tag to remove from the project file.
Docs.summary: Allows hosts to programmatically remove [<Import>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) tags that are part of a project file being manipulated by the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Removing an import marks the project as dirty, which means that the project will be re-evaluated at some point during other operations on the project instance.
